t: Simonds A8 BroadBand Bimetal Band Saw Blade with Positive Rake, Variable Tooth, 0.042" Thick, 5-8 TPI, 1-1/4" Width x 162" Length: Amazon.com: Tools & Home Improvement
s: In fact I would be inclined to believe that Ellis uses Simonds A8 blade stock. The Ellis saws are known to use the dry cutting system with minimum heat being transferred to the blade. The course tooth blades are best for dry cutting IMO, I usually order 3 to 4 TPI blades for dry cutting and I'm really impressed with the Ellis saw dry cutting ability. My other bandsaw is a wet type and works best with a finer tooth blade. If anybody has any info on what brand ...
